Author: rolliesharpener
Text: That's such a good point! It really goes to show the sheer variety of our experiences that may have contributed to our common ground, our EDs. I find it ironic that since I've lost weight I've received more attention but that's just the opposite of what i want.  Thanks <3

Author: drinksriracha
Text: I find it ironic that a large portion of people with EDs are trying to become agender looking, and the other half wants to become feminine goddesses.  Also people trying to lose so as to not have attention on them, VS people losing and finding that they are hit on/noticed a lot more and treated positively.   That said, I am sorry for your experiences. That sounds extremely unpleasant. I hope you are able to practice self care and relax after this day.
